data.title: 'Super Bob Einstein' celebrates the late actor's life and comedic style
data.meta_description: The film, which debuted on HBO on December 28, explores the many evolving layers of Einstein’s comedy from the people that knew him best. “He was so funny by not trying to be funny,” Mary says.
data.text:
Mary Lucia talks about The Super Bob Einstein Movie, which debuted on HBO on December 28, 2021, and is now streaming on HBO Max. The film celebrates the life and legacy of the late actor, writer and producer Bob Einstein (Super Dave Osborne; Curb Your Enthusiasm).

"All of the people recalling his comedic style just point out that it was unbreakable," Mary says. "He was so funny by not trying to be funny."

The film is written, produced, and directed by Danny Gold and produced by George Shapiro and Aimee Hyatt.

Watch more of what Mary Lucia has to say in the video above.

The Super Bob Einstein Movie - HBO
